Mabel Itohanosa Erioyunvwen Evwierhoma (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1965) bụ onye nkuzi Naịjịria
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke ihe nkiri na Mahadum Abuja
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na echiche dị egwu, nkatọ, ọmụmụ okike na ọmụmụ ọdịbendị.
A mụrụ Mabel Evwierhoma na Peter Omoviroro Tobrise na Theodora Tobrise, nké a mụrụ Aiwerioghene
Ọ gara Abadina Primary School site na 1970 ruo 1975;, na Federal Government Girls College, Bauchi site na 1976 ruo 1981
O nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu na 1983 na Federal School of Arts and Science, Suleja
Ọ gara Mahadum Ibadan, nweta BA na Theatre Arts na 1986 na MA na 1988
Site na 1989 ruo 1990 ọ bụ onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Ibadan tupu ọ banye Mahadum Abuja na 1990 dị ka onye enyemaka nkuchi
ya n'afọ 1996, e mekwara ya ka ọ bụrụ Prọfesọ zuru oke n'afọ 2005.

E bipụtara festschrift maka Evwierhoma na 2015. O kwuru okwu nkụzi na Mahadum Abuja, 'Nne bụ ọlaedo', na 21 Jenụwarị 2016. N'afọ 2019 ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ atọ e depụtara maka ọkwa osote chancellor nke Mahadum Abuja.
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, Evwierhoma kwuru okwu 'Idu n'ike dị ka Anti-culture na Naịjirịa nke oge a', na-akpọ maka nguzogịde ọdịbendị na ndokwa iwu megide ndina n'ike.
